GolosFeedback - это микросервис на блокч: GolosFeedback - is a microservice on the blockchain Golos that allows you to manage все the messages with ideas, offers and problems from your clients or users. This platform is a thin client, that works without a backend (only frontend and blockchain) directly on the GitHub Pages (through CloudFlare).
Скрипт добавляет все необходимые ресурсы: Script adds all the necessary resources to deploy GolosFeedback to your website or applicaion. All the interface of our service will be placed into a modal window with special button-toggler. The button will be added to your page above all content so everybody always be able to interact with GolosFeedback.
Вы можете настроить различные опции микр: You can set different options of the microservice by passing some additional parameters. All that you need is to create special variable with the name of 'gFeedbackOptions'. Check out this example
Если у вас есть какие-либо идеи / пробле: If you have any ideas / problems / questions, you can report it
Чтобы продолжить, вам необходимо войти!: To continue, you need to login!
Пожалуйста, введите ваш логин и мастер-п: Please enter your login and master password
Пожалуйста, введите только ваш приватный: Please enter only your private posting key
В этой категории пока нет отзывов. Вы мо: There's no feedbacks in this category yet. You can be the first
